title: OurType
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : OurType**

OurType is a [Belgian](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Belgium) type foundry launched by [Fred Smeijers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fred%20Smeijers) and [Rudy Geeraerts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Rudy%20Geeraerts) in 2002. Since 2003 it is managed by Fred, Rudy, and [Corina Cotorobai](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Corina%20Cotorobai).

**OurType Designers**  
Fred Smeijers  
Peter Verheul  
Merel Matzinger  
Artur Schmal  
Nikola Djurek  
Thomas Thiemich  
Hendrik Weber  
Maurice Göldner

**URL:** [http://www.ourtype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/www.ourtype.com/ "http://www.ourtype.com")

**Fonts**  
 [Alto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alto) by [Thomas Thiemich](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Thiemich)  
 [Alto Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alto%20Condensed) by [Thomas Thiemich](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Thiemich)  
 [Alto Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alto%20Extra%20Condensed) by [Thomas Thiemich](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Thiemich)  
 [Alto Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alto%20Mono) by [Thomas Thiemich](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224657/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thomas%20Thiemich)
